result.execSummary:
The defendant Stephen P Scott was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: All fines/costs due by 03/01/2016. Failure to pay will result in 1 day in the county jail for every $25 outstanding.
Defendant must submit to a DNA sample at the Ozaukee Co Jail

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Stephen P Scott

records.addlTxt: Order to Cancel Commitment forwarded to Sheriff dispatch.
Court ordered financial obligations paid in full.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Debt has been certified to WI DOR tax intercept program.

Defendant Stephen P Scott in court.  Shannon M. Whitworth appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State advises court an agreement was not made at pretrial conference. Court enters not guilty plea on behalf of the defendant. Court passes case for defendant to speak with ADA Whitworth. 9:03 a.m case recalled/same appearances. Defendant will plead guilty to charge and accept offer. Case passed for defendant to fill out plea waiver. 9:28 a.m. case recalled/same appearances. Defendant files plea questionnaire. Court examines defendant on plea questionnaire.  Defendant changes plea to no contest.  Court accepts change of plea & finds defendant guilty.
w/conditions: no operation of a motor vehicle w/o license

Defendant Stephen P Scott in court.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court advises defendant of penalties. Defendant received copy of complaint and waives reading. State requests $500 signature bond with conditions. Court orders bail. Pretrial scheduled for 12/14/15.  Case recalled 9:37a.m., same appearances. Defendant files waiver of right to attorney. Court examines defendant on waiver and accepts said waiver. Case recalled 9:50 a.m., same appearances. Plea hearing scheduled for January 5, 2016 at 08:30 am.

citations.chargeDescr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
